Text: Abgo daayman daluuliin. Wa sawwu kulla cheyy be nafas baarid. Wa abgo daayman sabuuriin. Wa sabburu nafisku ambeenaatku be l-mahabba.

Text: Al-Ruuh al-Khudduus ja’alaaku cha’ab waahid. Wa jaahudu achaan al-wihda ma tatlaf. Wa ahfado al-wihda di be l-salaam.

Text: Wa laakin ayyi waahid minnina ligi atiiye khaassa min al-Masiih al-antaaha hasab ni’matah achaan beeha nakhdumu leyah.

Text: Wa hu bas al-anta ataaya le l-naas. Wa naas waahidiin hu ja’alaahum rusul wa waahidiin ja’alaahum anbiya wa waahidiin ja’alaahum mubachchiriin wa waahidiin ja’alaahum chuyuukh wa mu’allimiin.

Text: Wa antaahum ataaya achaan humman yijahhuzu cha’abah al-saalihiin le yakhdumu leyah fi chaan ummat al-Masiih tabga gawiiye.

Text: Wa yisawwu khidmithum lahaddi kullina sawa nalhago al-wihda fi l-iimaan wa na’arfu Ibn Allah tamaam. Wa kullina nabgo aagliin lahaddi ayyi waahid yabga tamaam misil al-Masiih hu tamaam.

Text: Wa misil da, ma nabgo battaan misil iyaal ma induhum sabaat. Humman misil maraakib dugaag fi l-bahar. Ma induhum gudra foog al-challaal al-biwaddiihum wa la l-riih al-tusuughum, awwal fi nuss waahid wa ba’adeen fi nuss aakhar. Wa fi l-masal da, al-riih wa l-challaal humman al-ta’liim al-ma sahiih al-waahidiin yi’allumu beyah wa l-najaada al-yukhuchchu beeha al-naas wa yiwadduruuhum.
